meaningMnemonic: If the <radical>yakuza</radical> <radical>slide</radical> you into a <radical>jet</radical>, things are <kanji>especially</kanji> bad for you. Not just normal bad, like, especially bad.
readingMnemonic: You're <kanji>especially</kanji> worried now, because they're putting you in some kind of <reading>chu</reading>te (しゅ). You already took a slide in here, and now you're teetering over the edge of a dark, steep chute into who knows where!
